title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: Im looking for thisThe bot will take data from cme also will read updates and will execute buying selling according updates.Also the bot will start entry in alt coins positions when btc is on support.Are there such a bot existing ?Im looking for adult bots for trading not those kids play retail bots All others are kids bots i mean the bot will collect info from instutions the cme wht i just mentoined and will act according its needed.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Those kinds of bots are mostly custom made by a developer. If you want something like that, simply hire a competent developer to make the bot for you.As for the CME thing, you can try, but you're going to simply get frontran by bigger trading companies that run such bots.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Lol Adult bots, kids play retail bots, whateverIf you have some coding knowledge, then I suggest you get right on it, otherwise you are not to get such a bot anywhere just sitting for you to find

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: So you basically want a bot which will read out certain events such as CPI prints, employment numbers, etc and take a trade based on that info?A bot like this is very professional grade and you will also need a quick connection to your brokerage for it to work, since you are going to be trading against many other high frequency traders out there.Generally you need to build this from scratch if you want it to work perfectly. Can’t buy such a bot for $50.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 24, 2022, 03:47:12 PMIm looking for adult bots for trading not those kids play retail bots Then build the bot from scratch yourself or give it to a developer to build one for you.

comments.author: South Park
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on July 24, 2022, 09:11:12 PMLol Adult bots, kids play retail bots, whateverIf you have some coding knowledge, then I suggest you get right on it, otherwise you are not to get such a bot anywhere just sitting for you to find  The needs of the OP are too specific and even if there is a bot like that I doubt it is sold openly as most likely it was developed by a trader himself for his own use, so he only has two options to pay someone else to code a bot like that for him, something which will be costly, or he will have to code such a bot himself, which is not easy to do as even if he could do so he will need to debug the code over and over again so the code does not have any bugs which could cost him money.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 24, 2022, 03:47:12 PMIm looking for thisThe bot will take data from cme also will read updates and will execute buying selling according updates.Also the bot will start entry in alt coins positions when btc is on support.Are there such a bot existing ?Im looking for adult bots for trading not those kids play retail bots All others are kids bots i mean the bot will collect info from instutions the cme wht i just mentoined and will act according its needed.No, I don't think you can find that kind of specific bots, every trading bots just have the basics if I'm not mistaken and this kind of settings should be tailor made you to you parameters.So if you want to have your own "adult bots", then you have to create it for yourself or hire someone to make it for you. I just don't understand why the data should be taken from cme?

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: If you want something adult as you say not kids versions then you have to be ready to spend big money like adults are ready to spend it and also adult knowledge to be able to operate it, because in my opinion if there is a developer who can make trading bots like you want but your knowledge of technology is very low you will have difficulty running it because trading bots is not enough just to activate but there will the commands you have to enter according to your trading target.
